articles.author: Karen Guregian
articles.title: NFL Notes: Bill Belichick continues to march to the beat of a different drummer - Boston Herald
articles.description: While the prevailing pre-draft view was that Mac Jones needed more help on offense, specifically at receiver and offensive tackle, Bill Belichick disagreed.
articles.content:
From a predictability standpoint, this was a classic Bill Belichick draft.
As in, its completely useless to try and predict which direction hes going to go. Perceived needs just don’t apply.
